PageInfo.Message:
When exploring the wilderness or dungeons,
you may obtain items.
These items can be dropped by defeated enemies,
or collected by investigating the terrain.

The points where you can collect items include
treasure chests, herbs, veins, fallen trees, and
bodies of water. They vary in kind.
<COL ffdc78>Some of them can only be collected
with specific tools like a Pickaxe, so make sure
to always carry one with you.</COL>
You can purchase collection tools at the Item
Shop, so be sure to keep them with you at all
times.

Even if you have obtained an item once,
you can return to the White Dragon Temple or the
base
and obtain it again by visiting the same place.
Remember where materials can be obtained
and visit them again when necessary.
